name: British Columbia Institute of Technology (BCIT)
about: British Columbia Institute of Technology (BCIT) is one of Canadaâ€™s largest and most respected aviation training schools. In partnership with Pacific Flying Club and Chinook Helicopters Ltd., BCIT offers comprehensive flight training programs that combine industry-focused academic education with rigorous flight training. The Airline and Flight Operations Diploma programs, available for both fixed-wing and rotary-wing pilots, follow strict standards set by Transport Canada and the aviation industry. Located at the BCIT Aerospace Technology Campus, Boundary Bay Airport, and Abbotsford International Airport, these programs equip students with the skills and knowledge demanded by global aviation employers, ensuring graduates are well-prepared for successful careers in the aviation industry.
